questions.question_text:
You install an unmanaged solution named SolutionA that has a dependency on another unmanaged solution named SolutionB.
What is the outcome when you attempt to uninstall SolutionB?
Which statement regarding ordering of items in the mobile navigation menu is true?

choices.B: Menu item placement is based on the site map.
choices.C: Most recently used entities appear first.
choices.A: Menu item placement is governed by mobile offline settings.
choices.D: Menu items are displayed in alphabetical order.

Which process type should you use?
